Inputs

Inputs

Inputs come in all colors









<div>
    <label class="text-green" for="email"> Green </label>
    <input class="green" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>

Sizes

Inputs can be resized



<div>
    <label for="email"> Small Input </label>
    <input class="small" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>

<div>
    <label for="email"> Default Input </label>
    <input type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>

<div>
    <label class="" for="email"> Medium Input </label>
    <input class="medium" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>

<div>
    <label for="email"> Large Input </label>
    <input class="large" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>

Styles

Change the look of your inputs with ease

Rounded

Inputs can be pill-shaped




<div>
    <label class="text-green" for="email"> Green </label>
    <input class="rounded green" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>

Filled

Inputs will be filled with a semi-transparent color




<div>
    <label class="text-green" for="email"> Green </label>
    <input class="filled green" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>

Combinations

Use .rounded with .filled to create the perfect input

<div>
    <label class="text-green" for="email"> Green </label>
    <input class="rounded filled red" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>

<div>
    <label class="text-green" for="email"> Green </label>
    <input class="rounded filled green" type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="example@email.com">
</div>

States

Inputs can be disabled
<div>
    <label class="" for="email"> Disabled Input </label>
    <input disabled type="email" name="" value="" placeholder="disabled@email.com">
</div>
